examples.source:
import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import { Menu, Dropdown, Icon, Button } from 'choerodon-ui/pro'; const menu = ( 1st menu item 2nd menu item 3rd menu item ); ReactDOM.render(
, document.getElementById('container'));

import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import { Menu, Dropdown, Button } from 'choerodon-ui/pro'; const menu = ( 1st menu item 2nd menu item 3rd menu item ); ReactDOM.render(
, document.getElementById('container'), );

description.zh: 分割线和不可用菜单项。
默认是点击触发菜单，可以移入触发。
description.en: The default trigger mode is `click`, you can change it to `hover`.

examples.source:
import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import { Menu, Dropdown, Icon, Button } from 'choerodon-ui/pro'; const menu = ( 1st menu item 2nd menu item 3rd menu item ); ReactDOM.render(
, document.getElementById('container'));

description.zh: 点击菜单项后会触发事件，用户可以通过相应的菜单项 key 进行不同的操作。
description.en: An event will be triggered when you click menu items, in which you can make different operations according to item's key.

description.zh: 传入的菜单里有多个层级。
默认是点击关闭菜单，可以关闭此功能。
description.en: The default is to close the menu when you click on menu items, this feature can be turned off.

description.zh: 默认是移入触发菜单，可以点击触发。
description.en: The default trigger mode is `hover`, you can change it to `click`.

description.zh: 左边是按钮，右边是额外的相关功能菜单。
description.en: On the left is the button and on the right is the menu of additional related functions.

node.html:
Dropdown

Property Description Type Default
disabled whether the dropdown menu is disabled boolean
getPopupContainer to set the container of the dropdown menu. The default is to create a div element in body, you can reset it to the scrolling area and make a relative reposition. example Function(triggerNode) () => document.body
overlay the dropdown menu Menu | () => Menu
placement placement of pop menu: bottomLeft | bottomCenter | bottomRight | topLeft | topCenter | topRight String bottomLeft
trigger the trigger mode which executes the drop-down action Array<click | hover | contextMenu> ['click', 'focus']
hidden whether the dropdown menu is hidde boolean
onHiddenBeforeChange a callback function takes an argument: hidden, is executed before the hidden state is changed. If return value is false, this change will be stopped. (hidden) => boolean 无
onHiddenChange a callback function takes an argument: hidden, is executed when the hidden state is changed Function(visible)
onOverlayClick a callback function takes an argument: event, is executed when the overlay click Function(event)

You should use Menu as overlay. The menu items and dividers are also available by using Menu.Item and Menu.Divider.

Warning: You must set a unique key for Menu.Item.

Menu of Dropdown is unselectable by default, you can make it selectable via .

Dropdown.Button

参数 说明 类型 默认值 版本
buttonProps 按钮属性，和 Button 一致 string 1.5.4
type 按钮类型，和 Button 一致 string button 1.5.4
icon 自定义下拉菜单图标 ReactNode 1.5.4
onClick 点击左侧按钮的回调，和 Button 一致 Function 1.5.4
size 整体大小，和 Button 一致 string default 1.5.4
funcType 按钮展现模式，和 Button 一致 string raised 1.5.4

More props Dropdown and Button

the trigger mode which executes the drop-down action
whether the dropdown menu is hidde
a callback function takes an argument: hidden, is executed before the hidden state is changed. If return value is false, this change will be stopped.
a callback function takes an argument: hidden, is executed when the hidden state is changed
a callback function takes an argument: event, is executed when the overlay click
as overlay. The menu items and dividers are also available by using Menu.Item and Menu.Divider.
Warning: You must set a unique key for Menu.Item.
Menu of Dropdown is unselectable by default, you can make it selectable via
点击左侧按钮的回调，和
If there are too many operations to display, you can wrap them in a
. By clicking/hovering on the trigger, a dropdown menu should appear, which allows you to choose one option and execute relevant actions.

pageContext.html:
A dropdown list.

When To Use

If there are too many operations to display, you can wrap them in a Dropdown. By clicking/hovering on the trigger, a dropdown menu should appear, which allows you to choose one option and execute relevant actions.
